basic.description:
Review of the French language in the North American context: written and oral exercises, compositions, short readings. Emphasis on grammar and vocabulary.
NOTE    Not available for credit towards any plan in FREN
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Révision de la grammaire I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from FREN P10; FREN P11; FREN P12; FREN111; FREN112.
One-way exclusion     May not be taken with or after FREN101;102;112;118;150;219;320; P10;P11;P12;P17;100;110
